name: hostly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Hostly behaviour is typical of a good host (= someone who has guests) : Here are some ideas for reducing your workload so you can relax and focus on other hostly duties. I remembered my hostly manners and invited her in for a cup of coffee.
More examplesFewer examplesThey asked to try the wine; I was hostly and said, "Of course."I prefer to fulfil my hostly obligations myself rather than asking everyone to bring a dish.I will be a polite, hostly person and watch the match later when everyone has gone home.
